For the first 200 kWh (1 - 200 kWh) per month: The charge rate is 21.8 sen/kWh. This means that for the first 200 kWh of electricity consumed in a month, each kWh will cost 21.8 sen.
For the next 100 kWh (201 - 300 kWh) per month: Once the electricity usage exceeds 200 kWh, the charge rate increases to 33.4 sen/kWh for the next 100 kWh consumed (201 - 300 kWh). This means that each kWh consumed in this range will cost 33.4 sen.
For the next 300 kWh (301 - 600 kWh) per month: After consuming 300 kWh in total, if the usage continues, the charge rate further increases to 51.6 sen/kWh for the next 300 kWh (301 - 600 kWh). Each kWh consumed in this range will cost 51.6 sen.
For the next 300 kWh (601 - 900 kWh) per month onwards: Finally, if the electricity usage surpasses 600 kWh, the charge rate rises to 54.6 sen/kWh for each additional kWh consumed beyond 600 kWh. This rate applies for usage ranging from 601 kWh up to 900 kWh and beyond.
